DataElement.preferredName: Parent Or Guardian And Recipient Same Contact Information Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The indicator that describes whether or not the parent or guardian and recipient have the same contact information.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Parent Or Guardian And Recipient Same Contact Information
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A mother or a father; an immediate progenitor._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._An individual who is authorized under applicable State or local law to consent on behalf of a child or incapable person to general medical care including participation in clinical research._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._A person who gets something._Equal, or closely similar or comparable, in kind or quality or quantity or degree._Information regarding the means of contacting a person or group.
